prompt:
In each round of dialogue, you will be given a spatial cognitive map corresponding to a panoramic image.
The cognitive map is a 20×20 grid. Movement is restricted to one grid at a time.
This map represents a top-down layout of a scene. The camera’s position is marked in red. 
The yellow marker indicates your starting point, and the green marker indicates your destination.
Object class information will be provided in the accompanying text.
Your task is to generate a simple path plan from the starting point to the destination.
Your initial position is at the starting point, facing toward the camera.
You may only use the following movement instructions to describe the path: move forward, turn left, turn right, and turn around.
Do not collide with any objects during the path.
Do not include any extra description. Only output the planned path.
